mapper.select: select count(*) count, et.nickName nickName, et.firstname firstname, et.lastname lastname, wit.email email, DATE_FORMAT(wit.workDate, '%Y-%m') workDate, SUM( TIME_TO_SEC( wit.workTime ) ) workTime from workapp_info_table wit, employee_table et where et.email = wit.email and DATE_FORMAT(wit.workDate, '%Y-%m') = #{0} and wit.workState != '0012' group by email having workTime >= ( TIME_TO_SEC(#{1})*count ) and workTime < (TIME_TO_SEC(#{2}) * count) order by workTime desc

select wit.workDate workDate, DATE_FORMAT(wit.startTime, '%H:%i:%s') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(wit.endTime, '%H:%i:%s') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(wit.restTime, '%H:%i') restTime, TIME_TO_SEC( wit.workTime ) workTime, wit.workState, wit.email, wit.dayOfWeek, et.nickName, et.firstName, et.lastName, CASE if( TIME_TO_SEC(wit.workTime) < TIME_TO_SEC(#{2}), 'good', 'warn') WHEN 'warn' THEN if( TIME_TO_SEC(wit.workTime) >= TIME_TO_SEC(#{3}), 'bad', 'warn') ELSE 'good' END condi
from workapp_info_table wit, employee_table et where wit.email = et.email and DATE_FORMAT(wit.workDate, '%Y-%m') = #{0} and wit.email = #{1} order by wit.workDate
select email, nickName, firstname, lastname, department from employee_table where status = 0 and email != 'admin'

select subt.count, subt.email, subt.workDate, subt.workTime, CASE if( TIME_TO_SEC(subt.workTime) < TIME_TO_SEC(#{2})*count, 'good', 'warn') WHEN 'warn' THEN if( TIME_TO_SEC(subt.workTime) >= TIME_TO_SEC(#{3})*count, 'bad', 'warn') ELSE 'good' END condi, et.nickName, et.firstname, et.lastname
from (select count(*) count, email, workDate, SUM( TIME_TO_SEC( st.workTime ) ) workTime from (select email, DATE_FORMAT(workDate, '%Y-%m') workDate, workTime from workapp_info_table where email = #{0} and DATE_FORMAT(workDate, '%Y') = #{1} and workState != '0012') st group by st.workDate order by st.workDate ) subt, employee_table et where subt.email = et.email
